means: （旨在欺骗或吸引人的）诡计，花招
欺骗，欺诈( wile的名词复数 )
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 怀尔斯 Wileman的变体

sentence.Network_en: She claimed that women "use their feminine wiles to get on."
sentence.Network_cn: 她声称女人“靠她们的小聪明来达到目的”。

sentence.Network_en: All her wiles were to persuade them to buy the goods.
sentence.Network_cn: 她花言巧语想打动他们买这些货物.

sentence.Network_en: The woman used all her wiles to tempt him into following her.
sentence.Network_cn: 那女人用尽了自己的诱骗本领勾引着他尾随而去.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 美国普林斯顿大学教授怀尔斯（Wiles）被世界公认最终证明了费马大定理，他的证明建立在两个日本青年数学家志村和谷山在上个世 …
1994年英国数学教授威尔斯（Wiles）宣称他证明了费马大定理。1996年出席了在德国召开的“世界数学大会”，领到了德国颁发的数学 …
...的新方法， 引人入胜的新方法，因此他风趣地说： 外尔斯（Wiles） 外尔斯（Wiles） 英国数学家， 1998年获菲尔兹特别贡献奖…

list.abs: To attract by wiles or temptation ; entice ., 吸引以诡计或诱惑来吸引 ; 诱惑.
The little boy has many wiles ., 这个小孩有很多诡计.
he is really a wiling horse ., 他真是头老黄牛.

entry.tran: (尤指女子说服人所用的)花言巧语，巧计
entry.def: Wiles are clever tricks that people, especially women, use to persuade other people to do something.

example.ex: She claimed that women 'use their feminine wiles to get on.'
example.tran: 她声称女人“靠她们的小聪明来达到目的”。

auth_sentence.content: Quips, and cranks, and wanton wiles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Quips, and cranks, and wanton wiles.

auth_sentence.content: Foxes and statesmen, subtile wiles ensure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Foxes and statesmen, subtile wiles ensure.

auth_sentence.content: Now...people are wise to the wiles of the credit card companies.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now...people are wise to the wiles of the credit card companies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now...people are wise to the wiles of the credit card companies.

means.word_mean: (旨在欺骗或吸引人的)诡计,花招

sentences.en: All her wiles were to persuade them to buy the goods.
sentences.cn: 她花言巧语想打动他们买这些货物。

sentences.en: Fox’s wiles will never enter the lion’s head.
sentences.cn: 狐狸的诡计永远进不了狮子的脑袋。
